page.title: 01LANDSCAPE
page.content: {COLINSBURGH}is a small rural village situated on the A921 in the region,sometimes called The Kingdom, of Fife. It lies seven miles from Anstruther and seven miles from Leven. There are uplands to the north of the village while the land to the south slopes three miles down to the Forth Estuary. Basically the village is a long straight street running east-west. There are only three short streets leading off. The houses all face the road. With one exception there are no front gardens but the majority of the houses have superb large gardens to the rear.
